<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Refund a Pix Payment By PactualID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/pix/merchant/limit-validator-v2/reversal/{pactualId}/return/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method handles the refund of Pix Payments passing through a limit validator. The amount passed is the value to be returned regarding an already submitted Pix Payment. More than one refund can be made for the same submitted Pix Payment, however, the sum of all refunds cannot exceed the payment's original amount.


The possible reasons for the return are listed on the table bellow and are required with each new requisition. 


| Reason|Error Name|Error Description|
|----------|:-------------|------|
|BE08|BankError|Returned as a result of a bank error.|
|FR01|Fraud|Returned as a result of fraud.|
|MD06|RefundRequestByEndCustomer|Return of funds requested by end customer.|
|SL02|SpecificServiceOfferedByCreditorAgent|Return of cash value due to an error related to PixWithdrawal or PixChange.|


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"examples":{"Example":{"value":"e03353bd-1ae6-46ba-81aa-193c6627f689"}},"name":"pactualId","description":"Unique identifier of the Pix made. ","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
